_header: Ground take in virtue by patriarchs old

CamJes56.First Lines:
[G]Rounde take in vertue by Patriarkes oldeffrom Abraham lynally
                    brought doune…
CamJes56.Last Lines:
…which in Ianyuere shall voide all oldeThis nowe þere
                    doth þeron Remembre

CamTCC601.First Lines:
ground take in vertu by patryarkes oldeffrom Abraham lyneally
                    brought dounIn theyre scriptures as prophetes oldeShewyd vnto theym by
                    reuelacioun…
CamTCC601.Last Lines:
…Whyche in Januare shall voyde all the greuaunceThys new yere
                    doth theron remembraunce

BLHar2255.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble,
                        ed.  
             John Lydgate: The Minor Poems, Vol. I: Religious Poems.
EETS
         e.s. 107 (1911; repr. 1961): 49-60.
